entry.title: WIND WARNING , Brantford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:33 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brantford Municipal Airport 06:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Temperature: 8.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 61 %
Dewpoint: 1.6°C
Wind: S 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this morning and early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 this morning then increasing to 60 gusting to 90 near noon. High 15. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
